reviews.review_msg: Took Econ 110. I literally dropped it after the second class. You can barely understand her, and for such a difficult course thats not helpful. If you struggle in math, school, or have a unique learning style, this isnt for you! She is not very empathetic and quite unhelpful actually. Does not answer questions properly. Not good for beginners class

Bianjun is not a good lecturer because she blitzes through the lecture covering many chapters in class giving us no time or practice to digest the content. Most of the written questions on her tests were not covered in class. Even reading the book and doing extra practice does not guarantee you'll do well in her class. I would not recommend.
Amazing prof. Lectures aren't hard to follow, homework is quite simple, quizzes and test are similar to the homework. Based Teacher
Shes, an awesome teacher! ALmost feels like grade 2 again! You can pass her class with your eyes closed! Highly recommend!!!

She makes the introductory level ECON Course very complicated. Her exam questions each of them is very tough, she does not think, the proficiency of each student is very different, and yet makes the exam ever harder. Moreover, she determines the pop quizzes as harder as the mid-term and finals. Overall an awful experience.

most definatley the BEST teacher i have ever had. She makes class interesting and teaches the material really really well. Work load is very light...midterms are challenging but as long as you study the notes that she gives, you should be fine. She gives exercises in class to make sure students understand and is very helpful! A++++++ prof!
hes  a really good teacher as long as you read the book youll do great

Very funny and engaging prof. He really wants the class to succeed but he does teach at an advanced level. Enjoyed the classes, suffered studying for the finals. Definitely read the textbook and make your own notes. Isn't too helpful after class but the class itself was interesting and entertaining
sooo funny! well I thought so anyways. People who think he is mean, clearly don't have a sence of humour, or they just don't put any effort into learning the material.
